```{r}
moda <- function(vec) {
  tabla = table(vec)
  moda1 = as.numeric(names(tabla)[tabla == max(tabla)])
  return(moda1)
}

listas <- list(
  c(1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,2),
  c(10,11,12,13,13,12,16,12,18,19),
  c(100,100,45,32,67,87,89,34)
)

mode = lapply(listas, moda)
print(mode)

```
